name: Goat out of hell!
description:
Here at impasta studios we've come together to create our game: Goat Out of Hell...where the main goal is to ...get out of hell.

You play as a cute fuzzy character attempting to run away from various monster within different levels of hell, trying to achieve your innocence!

**Current content**

Level 1 being developed

**coming content**

Completion of level 1

Sound

Level selection 

Level 2

**future content**

Full scene animations

5 different levels

Soundtracks

New enemies

And much more!!
